text: Anekesvaravadyanca vayada allaha ani tyacya paigambarasi kasa kaya rahu sakato, tyancyakherija, jyancyasi tumhi masajide haramajavala vacana karara kela ahe, tara joparyanta te loka tumacyasi karara-palana karatila, tumhihi tyancyasi kelelya vayadyavara kayama raha. Sarvasrestha allaha, bhaya rakhuna vaganarya lokansi prema rakhato
